duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with training class scheduling and ensuring proper classroom setup
Creating and delivering presentations using Excel, Access, and PowerPoint
Performing general administrative duties such as phone handling, ordering supplies, and making travel arrangements
Generate reports and maintain databases for provider credentialing
Assist with acquisition of contracting interest and maintenance of databases for provider contracts

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/ GED or Associates degree or 2 years of College Coursework
